tidbits.title: Ancient Ruins
tidbits.description: Tunisia is home to impressive ancient ruins, including the Roman city of Carthage and the well-preserved amphitheater of El Jem, showcasing its rich historical heritage.

tidbits.title: Mediterranean Coastline
tidbits.description: The country boasts beautiful Mediterranean coastlines with sandy beaches and resort towns like Hammamet, attracting tourists seeking sun, sea, and relaxation.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Tunisia has a blend of Arab, Berber, and Mediterranean influences, reflected in its architecture, cuisine, music, and vibrant souks (markets) filled with local crafts.
